translation.en: -[JT] Howdy, miss. -[Chad] How's it going?
translation.ko: "채드와 JT는 남부 캘리포니아 출신 활동가이고" - 안녕하세요, 아가씨 - 잘 지내세요?

translation.en: [JT] Can we get you to sign our petition?
Hey, you've got a great smile, sir.
Would you sign our petition to stop talking shit on e-scooters?
translation.ko: 전동 스쿠터를 욕하지 못하게 청원서에 서명해 주실래요?

translation.en: To stop talking e-shit on scooters?
Just regular shit on e-scooters.
-Sure. -Thanks.
What's e-shit?
Yeah, we're pretty prominent scooter riders,
and we've been facing some pretty heavy verbal abuse
translation.ko: 스쿠터를 탈 때마다 심한 욕을 들어서

translation.en: every time we've been riding. Someone called me a straight-up bitch.
translation.ko: 너무 속상해요 어떤 사람은 저더러 개자식이래요

translation.en: That's fucked up, bro.
I mean, I don't like them.
People who ride them tend to be fucking stupid and dangerous on them.
translation.ko: 스쿠터 타는 사람들은 멍청하고 위험할 때가 많아요

translation.en: I don't know, dude. Most riders I know are chill.
translation.ko: 글쎄요, 내가 아는 사람들은 대부분 느긋한데

translation.en: It's not about chill. It's about being stupid on the strand.
translation.ko: 느긋한 게 문제가 아니라 바닷가에서 멍청하게 굴잖아요

translation.en: Well, I see them as kind of scary because they come riding past you so fast
translation.ko: 그 사람들 좀 무서워요 걸어가고 있을 때 엄청 빨리 지나가거든요

translation.en: when you're just walking along.
translation.ko: 걸어가고 있을 때 엄청 빨리 지나가거든요

translation.en: -Yeah. -Right.
If you sign that, you can't say things like that anymore.
translation.ko: 서명하시면 앞으로는 그런 말 못 하세요

translation.en: Oh, okay. [chuckles]
Thanks. Now for the rest of your life,
you can never utter another bad word about e-scooters or those who ride them.
translation.ko: 전동 스쿠터나 그걸 타는 사람들을 욕하실 수 없어요

translation.en: Okay.
-Do you want my email? -Yes, please.
I'm all about ripping, but not at the cost
translation.ko: 나도 속도감을 즐기지만 자전거 타는 어린이나

translation.en: of some fucking kid on his bike or some lady walking her dog.
translation.ko: 개 산책시키는 여자를 칠 만큼 무모하진 않아요

translation.en: If we could get you on a scooter right now, would you be down to try?
-Possibly. -Dude, let's do it.
-[JT] Go, baby! -[Chad] Let's do it!
[JT] Learn to love it!
He looks stoked.
Dude, he looks good. Look at him go!
-[Chad] Dude, he's touching some crete. -[JT] One-footer!
-Let's go-- -Not gonna lie, feels good.
-Yeah, dude! Did you like it? -You loved it.
[Strider] You could say Chad and JT are…
They're activists. What does that mean? They're spreading stoke.
translation.ko: "스트라이더 윌슨 팀원" 활동가예요, 무슨 뜻이냐고요? 열정을 퍼뜨려요

translation.en: These guys are built to create change.
[man] You can tell they're great guys. I just met them
translation.ko: 좋은 사람들인 것 같아요 방금 만났는데

translation.en: and walked up and asked for a selfie. You know, nice as can be,
translation.ko: 같이 셀피 찍자고 했더니 친절하게 응해줬고

translation.en: and I love their energy.
-Hey, move over here! -[Chad] Hey, guys.
You should post up and watch our dance. It'll be sick.
translation.ko: 와서 우리 춤을 보세요 완전 멋져요

translation.en: -It's for a charitable cause. -Wanna watch our dance to save the coral?
translation.ko: - 자선적 목적이에요 - 우리 춤을 보고 산호초 살리세요

translation.en: JT and Chad's activism, I describe it as things that actually are really good
translation.ko: JT와 채드의 행동주의는 실제로 인류를 위해 아주 좋은 거예요

translation.en: for humanity, like saving the coral reef as well as
translation.ko: 실제로 인류를 위해 아주 좋은 거예요 예를 들어, 산호초를 살리고

translation.en: parties.
Why not? We need to have more fun in life.
translation.ko: 나쁠 거 없죠 더 즐겁게 살아야 해요 "모니카 파 JT의 엄마"

translation.en: Most of what Chad and JT do is completely moronic,
translation.ko: 채드와 JT가 하는 일은 멍청함의 극치를 달려요 "케빈 (갑분싸) 팀원"

translation.en: but they're trying really hard. It's admirable how hard they're trying.
translation.ko: 하지만 열심히 노력하죠 열심히 노력하는 게 기특해요

translation.en: [Chad] Thank you! [cheers] Thank you!
You guys are inspiring me and a lot of people.
translation.ko: 너흰 나랑 많은 사람에게 영감을 줘

translation.en: -[JT] Hell yeah. -Thank you.
[JT] Thank you for saying that. It's really nice.
Chad's probably the hottest in our squad. His hair is beautiful.
translation.ko: 채드는 우리 팀에서 제일 섹시해요 머리카락이 아름답죠

translation.en: He's the best surfer out of the group.
JT is probably the smartest dude I've ever met.
translation.ko: JT는 제가 만난 가장 똑똑한 친구일 거예요

translation.en: I've never seen anyone excel at vacation activities like JT does.
translation.ko: JT만큼 휴가 레저 활동을 잘하는 사람은 처음 봤어요

translation.en: They're two of the best bros and will have your back, no matter what.
translation.ko: 두 사람은 최고의 형제고 어떤 상황에서도 지지해 주죠

translation.en: I first heard about Chad and JT
translation.ko: 처음 채드랑 JT에 대해 알게 된 건

translation.en: when I saw their video of them at the city council
fighting against parties being banned in the Hollywood Hills.
translation.ko: 할리우드 힐스에서 파티가 금지되는 걸 항의했죠

translation.en: Last week I heard the gut-wrenching news
you've passed a bill banning house parties.
translation.ko: 시의회에서 하우스 파티를 금지하는 법안을 통과시켰죠

translation.en: I won't lie to you, Council. I'm not stoked.
[reporter] What makes it a party ban, rather than a party restriction?
translation.ko: 파티 제한과 파티 금지의 차이가 뭐죠?

translation.en: [JT] I think that's pure semantics. The reality is,
they're trying to steal the fun from these wonderful people.
translation.ko: 이 멋진 사람들에게서 재미를 훔치려는 거예요

translation.en: I'm not surprised they became so famous.
translation.ko: 채드랑 JT가 유명해진 게 놀랍지 않아요

translation.en: It feels like everybody can connect with them.
They fight for the things that will bring more stoke to the community.
translation.ko: 지역 사회에 더 큰 열정을 가져오려고 노력하죠

translation.en: It's gotta be the chillest, most down-to-earth bros on the planet.
translation.ko: 세상에서 가장 멋지고 겸손한 사람들일 거예요

translation.en: I don't know who Chad and JT are.
They were running, gunning, and drilling it.
[Chad] Bring e-scooters to the Olympics!
[Strider] Straight up raising awareness everywhere they went. It was epic, dude.
translation.ko: 가는 곳마다 인식을 높였죠 정말 대단했어요

translation.en: They were on top of the world. And then,
they try, uh, to do this thing to save the boarders.
And that was basically a U-turn for them.
What's up, dudes?
We're here today to fight for a cause that's near and dear to our hearts,
translation.ko: 오늘은 우리한테 매우 중요한 대의를 위해 싸울 겁니다

translation.en: the safety and freedom of skateboarders.
For far too long in society, skateboarders have been oppressed.
translation.ko: 우리 사회에서 스케이트보더들은 너무 오랫동안 억압받았어요

translation.en: It's still illegal in parts of southern California,
with cops handing out tickets and security guards being aggro.
translation.ko: 경찰들이 딱지를 끊고 경비들은 공격적인 태도를 보이죠

translation.en: That's why we'll set up a booth in Huntington Beach to fight for the cause.
translation.ko: 그래서 헌팅턴비치에 부스를 설치하고 싸울 겁니다

translation.en: Come out, support us, and let's go!
-[Chad] Hey, dude. -[JT] Hey, what's up, sir?
-[Chad] You down to protect our boarders? -[JT] Do you want to protect our boarders?
I do, but I'm in a hurry.
Do you guys wanna protect our boarders?
[man] Yeah, I do. I…
-[JT] Can we get you to sign our petition? -I can do that.
Yeah, it's a huge issue.
[man] Yeah, I'm all about closing them.
We want a system where there's, like, no citations,
no people getting booted. It's fully legal and secure for the boarders.
translation.ko: 쫓겨나지도 않고 보더들에게 합법적이고 안전한 곳을 원해요

translation.en: Really, the bottom line with borders is, it's just like your house.
translation.ko: 국경의 가장 중요한 점은 집과 같다는 거예요

translation.en: You'd rather people come in through the front door than jump over the fence.
translation.ko: 담을 넘어오게 하는 것보다 정문으로 들어오게 하는 게 낫죠

translation.en: If we had an immigration system where we started letting people in,
translation.ko: 이민 정책을 통해 사람들을 받아들일 거면

translation.en: you know, do it legally.
-What? -[man] Yes.
-Whatever. -Yeah.
-What was he talking about? -I don't know, dude.
-I'm stoked he's fired up by the cause. -Yeah, dude, we got that signature.
translation.ko: - 우리의 대의가 맘에 드나 봐 - 서명을 받았으니 됐어

translation.en: I'm from up north. I'm from Massachusetts.
We're so far from the border. It's only something you hear on the news.
translation.ko: 국경에서 너무 멀어서 뉴스에서만 듣는 얘기죠

translation.en: So there are no boarders in Massachusetts?
No.
-[JT] Whoa. That's crazy. -[Chad] Whoa.
-The city doesn't allow it? -What do you mean?
translation.ko: - 시에서 허락을 안 해요? - 무슨 뜻이에요?

translation.en: If you try to skate in Massachusetts, they kick you out?
When I was 18, I was in Tijuana every weekend.
-Nice. -That place is… disgusting, you know?
They were treating people wrong. Even Mexican children.
They were treating people wrong. I didn't like that.
They were skating where they weren't supposed to?
I guess so. If you wanna put it that way.
-Oh, okay. -Right.
We all skated where we weren't supposed to at some point.
translation.ko: 다들 금지된 곳에서 스케이트를 탄 적이 있죠

translation.en: If you work and pay taxes to support everything--
I don't know what we're talking about.
-[Chad] It was-- -Keeping borders safe.
Right. We're on the same page then. Sweet.
-[JT] My dude! You believe in the cause! -[Chad] Dude!
-Protect our boarders, baby! -Let's go!
-[JT] What a legend! -Had me making a U-turn.
Haven't seen anyone in gear.
translation.ko: 우리 티셔츠 입은 분 처음 봐요

translation.en: Why do you believe in protecting our boarders?
There's a lot of shitbags over there that don't need to be over here.
They come at you, sideways and cross-eyed like they wanna start a gang thing on you.
translation.ko: 마약에 취해 제정신이 아닌 놈들이 죽일 태세로 달려들죠

translation.en: We've seen that. You can be shredding, and they'll roll up on you like,
translation.ko: 그런 사람들 본 적 있어요 슈레딩을 하면 공격적인 투로

translation.en: "Get out of here." You're like, "What's with the attitude?"
Can we get a selfie with you?
-Sure. -Hell yeah.
Let me--
-Whoa! -Nice, dude.
-My board. -All right. Here we go.
-Dude, so-- -Get in here, dog.
-Got it, dude. -My nickname's Iggy.
[Chad] Iggy, what up? So stoked you wanna protect the boarders.
I do. They bring them to our country.
We give them everything in medical business. Everything!
translation.ko: 모든 의료 혜택을 제공하죠 모두 다요!

translation.en: Twenty-two percent loans and shit, you know on interest rates and shit.
They get 0% interest rates.
-Whoa. Thanks, man. -Catch you here later.
What a diverse range of views on skateboarders.
For sure.
[Strider] Chad and JT posted that image with the wrong spelling of boarders.
translation.ko: 채드와 JT가 사진을 올렸는데 '보더' 철자가 달랐죠

translation.en: I don't think they knew anything what they were talking about with that.
translation.ko: 사람들이 무슨 말을 하는지 전혀 몰랐던 것 같아요

translation.en: But life continued as usual for them, at least for a bit.
translation.ko: 하지만 그들의 삶은 계속됐죠 적어도 한동안은요

translation.en: Uh, what up, Council? My name's Chad Kroeger.
I'm here to promote an amazing, new, holistic practice.
translation.ko: 놀랍고 새로운 건강 요법을 홍보하러 왔어요

translation.en: It's something I accidentally discovered at my first Weenie Roast.
translation.ko: 제가 처음 위니 로스트에 갔을 때 우연히 알게 된 거예요

translation.en: During The Lumineers' set, I passed out face down, nude,
translation.ko: 더 루미니어스가 공연할 때 알몸으로 엎드려서 기절했는데

translation.en: and spread-eagle in the sun.
translation.ko: 태양 아래 사지를 뻗고 쓰러져 있었죠

translation.en: And soon thereafter, security woke me up.
And I was surprised at how lucid I was.
I was expecting to be sloshed.
Here's the thing.
I wasn't.
I didn't realize where this mysterious boost came from
translation.ko: 그 신비한 에너지가 어디서 왔는지 몰랐는데

translation.en: until my health guru Troy, from Venice,
translation.ko: 베니스에 사는 제 건강 구루 트로이가

translation.en: showed me something called perineum sunning.
Perineum sunning is where you allow direct sunlight
to penetrate your bare sphincter for 30 seconds or more.
translation.ko: 30초 이상 괄약근을 뚫고 들어가게 하는 거예요

translation.en: -Dr. Drew says that the sun is a massive-- -[man] Mayor. Mayor. Mayor.
The public speaker is allowed to speak about something
that's within the jurisdiction of the City of Irvine,
but this subject matter is not.
This is a holistic practice that'll radically change everyone's lives.
translation.ko: 모두의 삶을 근본적으로 바꿀 건강 요법이에요

translation.en: Point of order.
Please allow my colleague to expand, and thank you.
translation.ko: 제 동료가 자세히 말씀드릴 겁니다, 감사합니다

translation.en: [JT] What up, Council?
The most difficult thing about perineum sunning
translation.ko: 회음부 햇볕 쬐기의 가장 어려운 점은

translation.en: is there's no space where we're allowed to practice it.
translation.ko: 그걸 할 수 있는 공간이 없다는 겁니다

translation.en: We can't at my mom's house because it weirds out her boyfriend Greg,
translation.ko: 엄마 집에서 못 해요 남자 친구 그레그가 불편해하니까요

translation.en: who is a legend.
And we're not allowed to do it at the parks,
so to your interjection that this isn't within the city's jurisdiction,
translation.ko: 그리고 공원에서도 못 해요 이게 시 관할 내의 문제가 아니라고 하셨는데

translation.en: we will ask that the city create a space for this health practice.
translation.ko: 이 건강 요법을 위한 공간을 마련해 주시기 바랍니다

translation.en: If it's cool with you, Council,
I'd love to have my friend and colleague, Chad Kroeger,
demonstrate the position for perineum sunning.
If you can redirect your attention towards the stairs.
Thank you, Chad.
And thank you, Council. We look forward to you guys putting this into action.
-[Chad] Is this it? -[JT] I think so.
The gate's ajar.
No, dude. It's a gate.
Dude, I wonder what big news Zedd has to tell us.
[JT] Maybe he just wants to show us his new place.
Whoa.
-[Chad] It's huge. -[JT] Big-ass door.
[Zedd] Coming.
[JT] What's up, dude?
-My dog. -Bring it in.
-Who's first? -[Chad] JT, you go first.
translation.ko: - 누가 먼저 할래? - JT, 먼저 해

translation.en: -How are you? -[Chad] What's up?
[Zedd] Welcome to the new crib.
-[Chad] Dude! -[JT] Dude!
[Zedd] Where do we even start?
-Uh, bathroom. -[Chad] Dude, nice.
-Giant tree. -[JT] Have you climbed that yet?
-[Zedd] Not yet. -[Chad] Dude, are these succulents?
Yeah.
-There is fish in there. -[JT] Do you have a shark?
translation.ko: - 저 안에 물고기 있어 - 상어도 있냐?

translation.en: There is a light in there, but I have no idea how to use it.
translation.ko: 안에 전등이 있는데 어떻게 쓰는지 모르겠어

translation.en: -So many spots to party. All ideal. -Yes, absolutely.
Speaking of party, by the way.
I don't know what your plans are, but…
I'd love to have you guys in Vegas with me.
If you guys would be down to give a speech on stage
translation.ko: 무대에서 너희의 행동주의에 관해 연설할 의향이 있으면

translation.en: about your activism. I have a residency there.
translation.ko: 무대에서 너희의 행동주의에 관해 연설할 의향이 있으면 내가 거기서 정기 공연 하거든

translation.en: -For real? -[Zedd] If you guys are down.
-Yeah, we're down. -Yeah.
-Yeah? -[both] Yeah.
-Dude. -Thank you.
[Zedd] We have to spread the love.
-Yeah. -[Zedd] My dog.
The Vegas show is about 3,500 people-ish.
I'm envisioning playing a song, slowing it down,
volume off, and I invite them on stage, and they jump up on the booth.
translation.ko: 볼륨을 끄고 저 둘을 무대로 초대하면 부스로 올라와서

translation.en: And they just give us a speech, you know, raise awareness.
translation.ko: 사람들의 인식을 높이는 연설을 할 거예요

translation.en: I mean, your activism is… I live for it.
I've always lived for it. That's how we met.
translation.ko: 늘 지지했지 그래서 우리가 만난 거야

translation.en: [JT] I know.
Vegas is the perfect platform of people from all around the world,
translation.ko: 라스베이거스는 완벽한 플랫폼이죠 전 세계 사람들이 한곳에 모여

translation.en: coming to one place
to spread a message that then goes back internationally back home.
That's the perfect place to do it.
I also want them because they're friends,
and I love being around friends.
So, dude, um…
We're gonna do perineum sunning if you're down.
translation.ko: 회음부 햇볕 쬐기 할 건데 같이 할래?

translation.en: [Zedd] What's that?
With your permission, we'd love to do it here.
It's where you sun your butthole.
It boosts stoke.
I might sit this one out. You can do it if you want to.
-Really? I mean-- -Be my guest.
-This spot would be perfect. -Yeah.
[Chad] Whoa, this is long.
-[Chad] All right. -[JT] You ready?
-[Chad] We're losing light. -[JT] Uno, dos, tres!
translation.ko: - 날이 저물고 있어 - 하나, 둘, 셋!

translation.en: I didn't know that that's how that works.
[JT] Wow, that's great.
I'm so glad this is happening right now.
translation.ko: 지금 이런 일이 생겨서 정말 기쁘다

translation.en: -[JT] Thanks, Zedd! -[Chad] Thank you, dude!
[Zedd] Oh, this is just beautiful.
When Zedd invited Chad and JT to do a speech in Vegas,
translation.ko: 제드가 채드랑 JT를 라스베이거스로 초대했을 때

translation.en: it was huge for them because it was everything they stand for.
translation.ko: 둘에겐 대단한 사건이었죠 본인들이 지지하는 모든 것이었으니까요

translation.en: Problem was the borders image was starting to spread.
translation.ko: 문제는 국경 사진이 퍼지기 시작했다는 거예요

translation.en: Their fans didn't take it well, but the guys were so busy spreading stoke,
translation.ko: 팬들은 기분이 상했지만 걔들은 열정을 퍼뜨리느라 바빠서

translation.en: they didn't know a storm was headed their way.
We're out here today to raise more money for the coral reefs.
translation.ko: 오늘은 산호초를 살릴 기금을 더 모으려고 나왔어요

translation.en: We've organized a Hollywood bus tour.
We're gonna take some of the most curious cinephiles in LA
and show them where their favorite movies were made.
translation.ko: 그들이 좋아하는 영화가 만들어진 곳을 보여줄 겁니다

translation.en: If you're into Hollywood, into movies, cruise!
All right, and we're off. Everybody, welcome to the Hollywood stoke tour.
translation.ko: 좋아요, 시작하죠 할리우드 열정 투어에 잘 오셨어요

translation.en: We're about to show you guys some of the most stoke-raising movie locations
in Hollywood.
We'll start it off hot. Up here on the right,
David Park's apartment from the fourth Fast and Furious,
translation.ko: '분노의 질주' 4편에 나온 데이비드 박의 아파트가 있어요

translation.en: "Fast and Furious."
-Which one? This one? -[Chad] Pretty awesome, right?
This is the big kahuna.
Bob's Food Market. You guys know it better as Toretto's Market.
translation.ko: 밥의 푸드 마켓 토레토의 마켓으로 더 유명하죠

translation.en: It's in Fast and the Furious 1,
where Brian O'Conner and Mia meet for the first time.
translation.ko: 브라이언 오코너와 미아가 처음 만나는 곳이에요

translation.en: He keeps ordering tuna sandwiches with the crusts cut off,
translation.ko: 브라이언이 빵 껍질 부분을 잘라낸 참치 샌드위치를 주문하는데

translation.en: which is a cute detail.
So was there any old Hollywood movie filmed around here?
translation.ko: 여기서 촬영된 고전 할리우드 영화는 없어요?

translation.en: Old Hollywood? The first Fast and Furious is 20 years old.
-[Chad] Yeah. -If you say so.
[JT] This is big-time.
Dominic Toretto's house.
Hell yeah. You guys fired up? Look at that.
That's probably the most famous house in all of LA.
Is this all Fast and Furious?
Oh, we can try to mix it up.
-Yeah. -Yeah.
[JT] What are you looking for?
-Uh… -Don't even ask.
Something a little more sort of glamorous, historic.
-Yeah, like classic-- -Like James Dean.
-[woman 1] The Hollywood-- -Who's James Dean?
Did you just ask who James Dean was?
Oh, dude.
Why are they on their phone?
[Strider] Somehow the "protect our borders" image got picked up by the mainstream media.
translation.ko: 주류 언론에서 '국경을 지키자' 사진을 보여주기 시작했어요

translation.en: That's when it blew up.
When you guys hear the phrase "Protect our borders," what does that, uh…
like, make you think of?
Are… are you serious? Like, protect our borders?
What does it mean to you?
We took a photo of someone with "protect our borders" shirts.
translation.ko: '국경을 지키자' 티셔츠를 입은 남자랑 사진을 찍었는데

translation.en: We thought it meant protecting skateboarders,
and then we posted it on our IG,
and now we're getting like…
-[woman 1] Backlash? -Yeah.
You're supporting keeping immigrants from crossing over.
translation.ko: 이민자들이 국경을 넘지 못하게 막는 걸 지지한 거예요

translation.en: Is immigration, like, a big issue?
-Haven't you seen the news? -My gosh.
You heard about BLM, right? Black lives matter.
-Is that a skate company? -I don't know why we're still trying.
translation.ko: - 스케이트 회사예요? - 계속 말해봤자 못 알아듣겠네

translation.en: Are you being canceled? Is that what the posts say?
-That's what they're tweeting. -[woman 2] Really?
That's not good.
It means you won't be popular on Instagram anymore.
translation.ko: 앞으로 인스타그램에서 인기가 없을 거란 뜻이에요

translation.en: This is where Johnny Tran's cousin Lance falls off his dirt bike. Pretty sick.
translation.ko: 여기서 조니 트랜의 사촌 랜스가 오토바이에서 떨어졌어요, 죽이죠

translation.en: [JT] That's from the first Fast and Furious.
I'm more worried about you not being educated
about things that are going on in our country.
[man] What happened now?
We're sorry. We're probably gonna have to stop for a second
translation.ko: 죄송한데 잠깐 멈춰야 할 것 같아요

translation.en: so we can call Zedd.
Wait, wait, wait. Where does the tour end?
-Uh… -Neptune's Net in Malibu.
-We're going to Malibu? -Malibu?
This is Vermont Avenue and Franklin?
translation.ko: 여긴 버몬트 거리잖아요 프랭클린 거리랑 교차로요!

translation.en: You guys hang tight, and we're going to have you back
where we said we'd have you at the time we said.
translation.ko: 약속한 시각에 약속한 장소로 모셔다드릴 겁니다

translation.en: -[woman 1] That's passed. -That's passed already.
[JT] Okay, well, as close as we can.
[woman 1] There's no way you can be that uneducated.
I think they were high.
-Did you guys see my vape? -No.
All good.
I think I'm actually traumatized.
After a while, I didn't have the energy to talk back to them. They were so stupid.
translation.ko: 얼마 후엔 대꾸할 힘도 없더군요 정말 멍청한 사람들이에요

translation.en: -[JT] Zedd. It's Chad and JT. -[Chad] Hey, Zedd.
We got your message. And, uh, just give us a call back, dude.
Uh, I think there's a big misunderstanding.
There's a lot of misinformation out there that I think is being, uh…
translation.ko: 잘못된 정보가 엄청 많이 퍼지고 있는데…

translation.en: That's misrepresenting me and Chad.
Just give us a call back and, uh…
-Yeah. -Love… love you.
Hey, we're giving a tour right now.
Guys, you wanna leave a voicemail for Zedd?
[all] No.
All right.
People were mad when they saw that photo.
translation.ko: 사람들은 그 사진을 보고 화를 냈어요

translation.en: The Internet's wacky right now.
Make one mistake like that, and you're done.
translation.ko: 그렇게 한 번 실수하면 모든 게 끝장나요

translation.en: It's amazing how people can turn against you so fast.
translation.ko: 사람들이 그렇게 빨리 등을 돌릴 수 있다니 놀라워요

translation.en: Oh, you're done.
[Strider] That night things got worse and worse.
translation.ko: 그날 밤 상황은 점점 더 나빠졌죠

translation.en: News of the border spread like wildfire.
By the next day, the guys had lost half their freaking fan base.
